definition: A term commonly employed to express a minimum or lowest level of expectation or requirement in a given situation. It is often used to indicate a condition that must be met at the very least, or to convey the idea of something being the bare minimum or the least that can be expected.

examples.english: I will at least be on time.

examples.german: Zumindest gibt es genug zu essen.
examples.english: At least there is plenty to eat.

examples.german: Er hat zumindest ein bisschen Talent.
examples.english: He has at least a little talent.
